name: Mindborn Sons
description: A fast-paced 3rd-person team-based battle arena game set in a rich mythological world, featuring tribe-based PVP and PVE gameplay across a lush, puzzle-filled map.
longDescription:
An innovative third-person team-based battle arena that blends fast-paced action with deep cultural mythology inspired by over 1.5 billion people across Asia. Players choose a tribe, customize their warrior, and enter the jungle of Magharesh to locate and retrieve three mystical 'vitals' back to their Altar—all while fending off rival tribes and racing against the clock. 

Conquest mode introduces both PVP and PVE elements, environmental puzzles, quests, and exploration. With seasonal content, a Founders Pass, and unique character, weapon, and armor drops, Mindborn Sons is built for competitive gameplay and long-term community engagement. 

I contributed to the game's core development with a focus on gameplay systems, multiplayer mechanics, and level interactions, ensuring a responsive, immersive, and scalable experience.
features: Team-Based Arena Combat – Tribe-vs-tribe battles in a competitive third-person format.
PVP & PVE Modes – Engage with both real players and AI enemies in dynamic conquest scenarios.
Mythology-Driven Setting – Built around Asian mythological influences for deeper narrative resonance.
Exploration & Puzzles – Navigate the jungle of Magharesh, solve environment-based puzzles, and complete quests.
Objective-Based Gameplay – Capture and return three vital artifacts to your altar to win.
Custom Characters – Players can customize tribe, character appearance, weapons, and armor.
Seasonal Progression – Upcoming Season00 Founders Pass with exclusive rewards.
Multiplayer-Ready – Built with Photon for seamless online play.

name: Plank Pushers
description: A Telegram-first Web3 endless runner game built for the Plank Pushers ecosystem, combining casual gameplay, token collection, and community engagement.
longDescription: Plank Pushers is a Telegram-first Web3 gaming experience where players, creators, and fans come together to build and share unique, token-integrated games. As the flagship title, this endless runner blends vibrant visuals, responsive gameplay, and crypto-native mechanics. Players navigate fast-paced cityscapes, dodge obstacles, and collect $PUSH tokens to unlock exclusive items. Built with Unity and WebGL, the game is optimized for seamless Telegram integration and real-time play. I contributed to front-end engineering, mobile responsiveness, and Web3 feature integration, including token collection logic and in-game reward systems.
features: Telegram-First Integration – Seamlessly embedded within Telegram for instant gameplay access.
Endless Runner Mechanics – Fast-paced, skill-based gameplay with increasing difficulty.
Web3 Token Collection – Collect $PUSH tokens during gameplay to unlock cosmetics and upgrades.
Skill-Based Progression – Reflex-based challenges that reward mastery over time.
Power-Ups – Enhance gameplay with boosts like speed, magnet, and coin multipliers.
Simple Controls – Tap-and-play mechanics tailored for mobile-first environments.
Urban Game World – Skate through vibrant, obstacle-filled cityscapes.
Real-Time Leaderboards – Compete with friends and global players on Telegram.
Cross-Device Optimization – Smooth performance across Android, iOS, and desktop Telegram clients.
Community-Centric Design – Built as part of a broader creator-first Web3 gaming ecosystem.

name: Megaplay
description: Sri Lanka’s first casual eSports platform for Dialog Axiata, offering a vast collection of daily-playable casual games developed by a diverse gaming community.
longDescription: Sri Lanka’s first-ever daily casual eSports platform, launched for Dialog Axiata users. It features the largest collection of casual eSports games, built by an extensive and vibrant community of game developers. The platform enables users to play, compete, and win daily rewards through engaging, quick-play games tailored for mobile accessibility. I played a key role in the full development cycle of the platform, with a strong focus on front-end engineering and seamless mobile app integrations. My responsibilities included crafting responsive UIs, optimizing performance across devices, and integrating real-time features to support dynamic gaming experiences.
features: Large Casual Game Library – Dozens of casual eSports games developed by the community, playable instantly.
WebGL Game Integration – All games are WebGL-based and loaded via secure web views inside the mobile app.
Mobile App Support – Fully optimized for Android mobile devices with smooth web-app and native feature integration.
User Profiles – Personalized user accounts with avatars, progress tracking, and performance stats.
Daily Leaderboards – Competitive leaderboards reset daily to encourage ongoing engagement and replayability.
Game Rating System – Users can rate games, providing feedback to developers and shaping future content.
Daily Challenges & Rewards – Incentivized gameplay through time-limited objectives and in-app prizes.
Push Notifications – Real-time alerts for new challenges, leaderboard updates, and featured games.
Community Engagement – Support for user feedback, game suggestions, and interactive ratings.
Authentication & Session Management – Integrated secure user login and session tracking.
Analytics Integration – In-game metrics tracking to monitor engagement, play trends, and retention.

name: Microbivore
description: Mobile and PC arcade game developed for Global Game Jam Sri Lanka 2020, themed around fighting the COVID-19 pandemic. Created within 48 hours as part of a national online game dev challenge.
longDescription: Created during the Global Game Jam Sri Lanka 2020, an online game development hackathon themed around overcoming the COVID-19 pandemic. The event, which offered a prize pool of LKR 100,000, brought together over 30 teams of developers from across the country. Developed entirely within 48 hours, Microbivore is a fast-paced arcade game where players control a microscopic organism tasked with eliminating viruses in infected environments. The game was built with both mobile and Windows platforms in mind, expanding its accessibility and reach. I handled the complete development process—from concept and design to gameplay programming, visual implementation, and cross-platform builds.
features: Pandemic-Inspired Gameplay – Eliminate virus clusters in microscopic environments to save host systems.
Cross-Platform Build – Available on both Android mobile devices and Windows PC.
End-to-End Development – Full solo development: game design, coding, assets, and publishing.
Arcade Action – Score-based gameplay loop with quick levels and rising difficulty.
Custom Visual Style – Themed UI and art assets reflecting biological and microscopic aesthetics.
SFX and Feedback – Responsive audio-visual feedback for every action and in-game event.
Built in 48 Hours – Designed and developed under tight game jam constraints.
Publicly Distributed – Made available post-event for download and player feedback.

name: MobiStation
description: A branded casual gaming platform for SLT-Mobitel, offering curated games and mobile-optimized gameplay with daily challenges and leaderboard features.
longDescription: Mobistation is a branded mobile casual gaming hub developed for SLT-Mobitel users. Similar in spirit to Megaplay, this platform provides instant access to a growing catalog of casual games, optimized for mobile play. Designed with a seamless and responsive UI, Mobistation enables users to compete in daily challenges, track their performance, and win real rewards. My contributions spanned front-end engineering, mobile view optimization, and platform integration. I focused heavily on UX refinement, smooth cross-device support, and implementing real-time features such as daily leaderboards and push notifications.
features: Curated Game Collection – A focused set of high-quality games tailored for casual users.
SLT-Mobitel Branding – Custom branding and theming integrated across the platform.
Daily Leaderboards – Resettable competitive ranking system to keep users returning.
Mobile-Optimized Interface – Designed for Android with fast load times and intuitive navigation.
User Profiles – Personalized dashboards with avatars, scores, and gameplay history.
Game Feedback System – Users can rate and comment on games, enhancing community input.
Push Notifications – Real-time alerts for daily rewards, new games, and leaderboard updates.
Reward Challenges – Time-based game events tied to in-app and carrier-based incentives.
Secure Login & Session Tracking – Integrated user authentication with persistent session handling.
Performance Analytics – In-depth tracking of user engagement and game interaction.

name: Vintage Villa
description: A responsive website for a luxury guest house in Kandy, Sri Lanka. Features intuitive navigation, booking system, and SEO optimization for a seamless user experience.
longDescription: A visually appealing and functional online presence for a premier guest house in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The website was designed to reflect the property’s luxurious and serene ambiance, blending vintage charm with modern functionality. A fully responsive site that ensures an optimal user experience across desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Key features include an intuitive navigation system, a streamlined booking interface, and high-quality visuals to highlight the property’s unique offerings, such as spacious rooms and scenic surroundings. The site was optimized for search engine visibility using best practices, including clean code and compatibility with SEO tools. Also integrated dynamic elements like image galleries and contact forms to enhance user engagement and drive bookings.

name: Vintage Villa Admin Dashboard
description: An admin dashboard for Vintage Villa's website with secure login, booking management, gallery uploads, and content control, optimized for ease of use and mobile responsiveness.
longDescription: This admin dashboard is designed to efficiently manage the Vintage Villa website, a luxury guest house based in Kandy, Sri Lanka. It features a secure login system that allows administrators easy and safe access. The booking management module enables admins to view, edit, and delete bookings, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations. A built-in media management system allows for seamless image uploads and organization, keeping the site’s gallery up-to-date and visually appealing. Administrators can effortlessly update content such as room details without requiring technical knowledge. Optimized for mobile responsiveness, the interface adapts fluidly across desktops, tablets, and smartphones—empowering admins to manage the site from anywhere. Designed with usability and efficiency in mind, this dashboard blends simplicity with powerful features to ensure Vintage Villa’s digital presence remains elegant, current, and functional.

name: Echoes of Greg
description: A 2D meme game created for memegames.wtf — a web gaming platform developed by the company I currently work for. Built using Construct 2, it delivers fast-paced, humorous gameplay with meme-style visuals.
longDescription: 2D web game developed for memegames.wtf, a gaming site launched by my current company. Built using Construct 2, the game is optimized for both mobile browsers and desktop environments. Players try to select the correct meme, arcade-style environment, featuring meme graphics, smooth animations, and responsive controls. The game includes sound effects, supports both touch and mouse input, runs in portrait mode, and utilizes WebGL for hardware-accelerated rendering—ensuring a fluid, cross-device experience.

name: NeonFury
description: A 5-day hackathon cyberpunk endless runner where you control a hovering car through a neon-lit cityscape, dodging turrets and obstacles.
longDescription: NeonFury is a high-speed, cyberpunk-themed endless runner built in just five days during a game development hackathon. Developed by a team of four—with me as the sole programmer alongside one 2D artist and two 3D artists—this Unity-powered game immerses players in a futuristic neon city. You pilot a hovering car through glowing streets, weaving between towering skyscrapers while dodging deadly turret fire and massive roadblocks. With power-ups like health boosts, shields, and super speed, gameplay rewards quick reflexes and strategic timing. I was responsible for the entire development pipeline: gameplay mechanics, obstacle systems, collision detection, visual effects, and power-up logic.
features: Cyberpunk Endless Runner – Set in a neon-lit future city with verticality and speed.
Hover Car Controls – Smooth, fast-paced flight-based vehicle handling.
Obstacle Avoidance – Dodge turret bullets, skyscrapers, and massive roadblocks.
Power-Ups – Health, shield, and super speed for survival and thrill.
Reflex-Based Gameplay – Fast decision-making and tight timing are key.
Hackathon-Built – Developed from concept to playable game in 5 days.
3D Visuals – Stylized cyberpunk art direction with glowing environmental effects.
Collision Mechanics – Avoid tipping over from impacts and recover from minor hits.
Full Gameplay Loop – Score, survive, and climb leaderboards.

name: MBS Launcher
description: A .NET-based launcher for Mindborn Sons that manages authentication, game downloads, and file integrity.
longDescription: MBS Launcher is the dedicated desktop launcher for the game Mindborn Sons. Built with C# and .NET, it serves as the central hub for game management—including user registration, login, file downloads, and integrity verification. The launcher ensures players authenticate before playing and provides tools to upload, delete, or relocate game files as needed. Designed with a focus on security, usability, and modular file handling, it's an essential component of the Mindborn Sons ecosystem. I handled the full-stack development of the launcher, including backend service calls, file operations, UI interactions, and error handling.
features: User Authentication – Login and registration system integrated with the game's backend.
File Management – Download, upload, verify, and delete game files securely.
Game Launcher – Automatically starts Mindborn Sons after successful login.
Change Installation Location – Move game files to preferred directories.
File Integrity Verification – Ensure no tampering or corruption before game launch.
Custom UI – User-friendly .NET interface with responsive elements.

name: Color Bounce
description: A vibrant, candy-themed endless tower-hopping game where players rotate color wheels to match bouncing balls mid-flight.
longDescription: Color Bounce is a fast-paced, endless arcade game where precision and timing meet colorful strategy. Players control a bouncing ball that drops from tower to tower. Players must tap in time to align the correct color segment before the ball lands. If the color matches, the ball bounces to the next tower—if not, it's game over. With a candy-inspired visual style, upbeat sound effects, and increasingly challenging speeds, the game offers both a casual pick-up-and-play vibe and rewarding skill progression. I handled gameplay programming, visual effects, and touch input optimization for mobile devices.
features: Endless Gameplay – Progressive challenge with increasing drop speed and shorter tower gaps.
Color-Matching Mechanic – Tap to rotate the color wheel and match the ball before impact.
Candy-Themed Visuals – Vibrant and playful design inspired by sugary arcade aesthetics.
Mobile-First UX – Responsive controls and smooth animations tailored for touch devices.
Score System – Tracks high scores to encourage replayability and competition.
Audio Feedback – Satisfying bounce sounds and alerts enhance moment-to-moment gameplay.
Instant Restart – Minimal downtime for faster retry loops and addictive play sessions.
Polished VFX – Bounce particles, glow effects, and smooth color transitions.

name: Frogged Out
description: A humorous level-based platformer developed in Unity. Players control a quirky frog that can crouch, jump, and dodge various obstacles while collecting coins and progressing through unique levels.
longDescription: Frogged Out is a funny, obstacle-packed platformer game built using Unity. Featuring a jump-and-crouch mechanic, the game lets players navigate through animated levels filled with traps, coins, and surprises. It features a charming story, expressive characters, smooth animations, and a shop system where players can buy accessories and skins. Levels cycle through day and night, adding variety and atmosphere. The game is currently in development, with plans for multiple levels and engaging progression.
